florist_section.special: We are a specialized full service floral shop which provides unique style in floral design and arrangements. Regardless of wherever you send your flowers, we guarantee of the same quality and freshness we would provide from our shop.

product.detailsDescription: A bouquet of red roses accompanied by white statice. A bouquet wrapped to perfection and suitable for any occasions as red roses simply symbolizes your passion, true love and desire while leaving the white statice to portray your utmost sincerity. This is the go-to gift that expresses your love and intentions without having to say a word.

about.title: About a Flower Shop
about.description: Flowers are more than just a gift; they are a heartfelt language, a way to communicate emotions and deepen connections with one another. The tradition of giving flowers has thrived over the years for this very reason, serving as the perfect medium to convey messages when words fall short. Gone are the days when logistical hurdles marred this beautiful expression. At Flower Chimp, we harness modern technology and an expansive network of handpicked florists across Malaysia to make flower giving an effortless, yet meaningful experience. With just a few clicks, you can now send stunning bouquets that speak volumes, making the act of giving as delightful as the bouquet itself.
about.description1: Our company was established in May 2005 and is located in the central business district of Hung Hom. We appreciate your support and feedback. With a focus on our products, customer needs, and high-quality services, we are committed to continual improvement. Our store uses the three elements of Art, Life, and Culture to create an alternative flower arrangement culture and aims to hire more new talented floral designers. To contribute to society, non-profit organizations are eligible for cost price or a minimum 10% discount.
about.contact_info: For further information, please contact us at 852-23348444
about.name: Senior Florist--Pauline Chan
